name: TonopahFreshStartSpeakers
0:
”Alexa, open tonopah speakers”
”Alexa, ask tonopah speakers for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start tonopah speakers”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tonopah speakers
des: Listen to speakers at the Fresh Start meeting of Alcoholics Anonymous in Tonopah, Arizona. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. Starts with the most recent speaker, but you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
